Text:
No offence Webchella, but...
Any comments on the validity of this release, since its not on any of the other private torrent sites?!
Confirmed working on Kmeaw 3.55 using latest multiman.....although I don't think there is any option for English subs. Thanks uploader!!

On hind sight those so called superior private site seems to have a policy against JPN which i should have realised.

Anyway many thanks for the uploads, and long may you last Webchella.
Gives me hope the US release will be playable on older firmware, if not this will work.

This is in japanese only but you can give this version other languages, atleast english, here:
http://www.ps3iso.com/archive/index.php/t-80203.html
I already did and am somewhere in the middle of chapter 2. All text is in english and all japanese dialogue subtitled in english.
